helptext:
You can choose for which Pokémon you want to be notified.

/add = Add Pokémon to notifiy list
/remove = Remove Pokémon from notify list
/list = List Pokémon on notify list
/reset = Reset configuration
/stop = Stop chat
/help = This menu

If you want to add more than one Pokémon to the list, use the ',' seperator.

Example:

 /add Glumanda, Glurak
welcome: Welcome to Pokémonbot. This bot allows you to configure notifications for Pokémon you like. You receive notification for the following Pokémon:
welcomeback:
Welcome back.
Your configuration is still active.
stopped: You are not notified anymore. Restart the bot with /start.
replylist: You receive notifications for the following Pokémon:
erroriv: Value has to be a number between 0 and 100.
